DOC.brief_summary: The objective study ass compare preliminary efficacy , safety tolerability fispemifene 300 mg placebo give daily 4 week treatment hypogonadal men chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) oral glucocorticoid therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Fispemifene Treatment Hypogonadal Men With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease That Are Oral Glucocorticoid Therapy
